name: 楊慧怡
objective:
- Enhance Self-Awareness to gain emotional balance.
- Develop emotional sensitivity to positively influence others. 
- Tap into sensory perception to enhance the quality of relationships.
- Practice tools/techniques to manage emotional issues. 
- Apply your emotional intelligence in different life areas. 

- 透過增強自我覺察，更好的發揮優勢 
- 提升感知他人情緒能力，改進人際關係 
- 增強與他人共情的能力，提升影響力 
- 掌握快速處理負面情緒的技巧 
- 掌握更有效的管理情情緒而長久保持良好正面心態的方法 
- 透過卓越的思維方式管理情緒使工作生活更輕鬆美好

Week 6: Deepening Self-Awareness (Integrating with Your Sensory Perception III)
Week 7: Manage your negative emotions
Week 8: Emotional attitude supporting system (Rainbow Tree Concept)
Week 9: Correlation between Self-Esteem and Self-Awareness
Week 10: How to develop Emotional Balance
Week 11: How to accept the attitudes of others and your conflict styles 
Weel 12: How to build trust relationship with others
Week 13: How to gain the respect of others
Week 14: How to deal with negative emotions of others
Week 15: Release the culprits of toxic emotions
Week 16: Establish healthy relationship with positive influence
Week 17:  Reflection, Q&A (I)
Week 18:  Reflection, Q&A (II)
